channel.title: Blogs on Hannah Kloss
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Hannah Kloss

item.title: Debut Post
item.description: Hello! After being directed to using Hugo for personal website development, I took to the reigns (and online documentation) to get right into creating what would likely become my portfolio. I am interested in “complex” game design, where my definition is as follows. In an ideal world, there would be sufficient time to make multiple games where the player choice matters. It doesn’t just slightly alter dialogue or anything easily missed, or miniscule.
